data.title: YUK.
data.text: I know people who order take out several times a week. My experience was really dreadful. I ordered jumbo shrimp with mixed veg. The shrimp were medium sized and were not cleaned at all, so I called the restaurant and let them know that I was disappointed. They picked up the order and told us they would re make it. No apology by the way--- When the order was returned, I am SURE that it was the same one I sent back. Still not cleaned and it was really unappealing. I could not eat it.

data.title: Good Chinese fast food for take out or eat in (no waiter service)
data.text: Taste and freshness is above average compared with other Chinese take out place.  Have several tables for eatting in.  This is a place that we visit once a week for lunch.  My favorites are the Chicken or shrimp with garlic sauce.

data.title: Beware! Not worth the trouble!!!
data.text: Unless you want to wait over two hours to get your food, order somewhere else! Took them two hours and 15 minutes to deliver my food which was disgusting and cold by the time it got to my house. When I called them, they offered me a $4 discount! When I said that wasn't enough, they lady said too bad.  I've been a customer for over 8 years!!!! These business owners are not smart! It's not worth losing a customer over especially when the food is terrible and cold.  Not worth the aggravation. Order from another place!

data.title: The Cook is an Absolute MORON!!
data.text: I order take out from this place often due to the proximity of my home. On my last order, I realized there was an issue when I brought it home and saw that I was short on an entree. I called them up to tell them and they said to let them know next time I order and that it would be corrected. So I ordered take out and my wife ran in to pick it up. Once again, the order was not correct. They were short on the entree and when my wife complained, the cook started yelling at her as if it was her fault. The cook could care less and continued to argue. I was just about to go in there myself to confront him but I held back. If the cook or owner, whoever he is was business smart.....he would realize that the customer is right and not jeopardize the loss of a frequent customer nor a negative review for everyone to see. At the end, this really means little to their business...but all I can say is FAREWELL CHINA GARDEN. Its on to one of the other 10 Chinese takeouts within a mile radius!
